data.text: That’s all I’m gonna say for now. We just can’t blame other people for things like this.

People out there need help. The first step is TALKING and understanding and demonstrating compassion. Not turning the tables on others. when things happen OUT OF THEIR CONTROL. Ariana had no control over this.
Yes it’s sad for his family, his friends, his fans. Start TALKING about mental health. Start TALKING about addiction. Start TALKING vs FIGHTING and getting OFFENDED about every little thing.

I’m not saying that is easy. It’s not. What we’re not going to do is actually blame Ariana for the death of Mac. You CANNOT put that on someone. That is now directly affecting her mental well-being too.

The relationship was toxic. She did what she could to help him and while she was good for him, his addiction (HIS) took a toll on her. You can only do so much, the change has to come from the addicted themselves.
